description: Train conductor Jiri Suchanek asks floppy-haired passenger (and sexy runaway) Zdenek Gomba for his ticket, but Gomba doesn't have one to offer him. Instead, Suchanek asks to suck him off as payment, and Gomba readily obliges. They head back to Suchanek's place for a shower, but instead they end up doing it doggy style over the tub, Suchanek pounding Gomba's hairy ass all the way to an explosive conclusion.
title: Prague Guys Jiri Suchanek and Zdenek Gomba Fuck
